thread.title: At trial, NBA's Sefolosha describes struggle with NYC police
thread.title_full: At trial, NBA's Sefolosha describes struggle with NYC police

title: At trial, NBA's Sefolosha describes struggle with NYC police
text:
> Top News At trial, NBA's Sefolosha describes struggle with NYC police Thabo Sefolosha, center, leaves criminal court in New York, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. The professional basketball player was about to give a handout to a man asking for money when police officers took him to the ground and arrested him, a former teammate testified Wednesday. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig) Search Help
